name: ScreenTime
title: Screen Time
description: Documentation of the amount of screen time (television, tablet, smart phone, computer, video games, etc) the person partakes in (Business ID: Entry 2446631)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Screen Time.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an documentation of the amount of screen time (television, tablet, smart phone, computer, video games, etc) the person partakes in.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes GROUP codes for Screen Time.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Screen Time.)

contains.display: Video, television or computer screen time (observable entity)
Hours per day watching television or videos (observable entity)
On a typical weekday in the past week, how much time did the patient spend watching TV AndOr DVDs
On a typical weekend day in the past week, how much time did the patient spend watching TV AndOr DVDs
On a typical weekday in the past week, how much time did the patient spend playing video games and computer games
On a typical weekend day in the past week, how much time did the patient spend playing video games and computer games
